Testing Kernagic

Kernagic is software under development to automate the metrics spacing of digital fonts. https://github.com/hodefoting/kernagic

(above) Original spacing of Ubuntu Font.

(below) Ubuntu Font with metrics automatically generated with Kernagic.

(above) Oxygen Sans Regular with spacing automatically generated with Kernagic.

(below) Kernagic processing and autogenerating font metrics in Oxygen Sans Regular.
